all_concepts: High reliability with mechanical moving parts absence
Solenoid valve for oil filling and relay output contact for alarm
Embedded electro-optic sensor for oil level monitoring
Nickel plated steel + fused glass PA glass fibre reinforced enclosure
Maximum working pressure of 130bar with higher limits available on different TK4 models
technical_specs: Some advantages of this solution: Extremely compact dimensions
High reliability ensured by absence of mechanical moving parts.
The TK4 is designed to control the oil level in the compressor crankcase
To avoid the compressor to run without oil and so improve its performance
The TK4 monitors the oil level with the embedded electro-optic sensor and comprises a solenoid valve for oil filling and a relay output contact to give an alarm.
Each TK4 requires 30VA (depending on the solenoid valve)

qa_pairs.question: What are the benefits of using a TK4 @130bar CO2 Oil Level Regulator?
qa_pairs.answer: The TK4 @130bar CO2 Oil Level Regulator offers several advantages, including extremely compact dimensions, reduced junctions for leakages, and simplified installation. Additionally, its revolutionary connectivity capabilities provide unparalleled flexibility and reliability. With no mechanical moving parts, the device ensures high reliability and minimizes maintenance requirements.

qa_pairs.question: How does the TK4 @130bar CO2 Oil Level Regulator ensure leakages?
qa_pairs.answer: The TK4 @130bar CO2 Oil Level Regulator reduces the number of junctions in the circuit, minimizing the possibility of having leakages. This design feature simplifies installation and reduces potential issues. By using a single product with two mounting possibilities (left/right), users can further minimize the risk of leaks and ensure reliable operation.

qa_pairs.question: What is the advantage of using MODBUS connectivity on the TK4 @130bar CO2 Oil Level Regulator?
qa_pairs.answer: The revolutionary connectivity capabilities of the TK4 @130bar CO2 Oil Level Regulator enable seamless communication with other devices and systems. This feature allows for real-time monitoring, control, and data exchange, making it an ideal choice for applications requiring high flexibility and reliability. With MODBUS connectivity, users can easily integrate the device into their existing infrastructure.
